You can set this parameter value by using command: configure -instdir PATH_TO_DIR. It should be called only after make buildAll target is executed! make clean - Removes the output and distribution folder (in order to start a new compilation from scratch) make distributions - Builds and configures ${upper.project.short.name} with all documentations and creates distribution package
